public-ipv4.title: Public IPv4
public-ipv4.description: Public ipv4 of the frontend (the one Apache will be indirectly listening to).

ip-read-limit.description: Value used to set IPReadLimit Parameter for antiloris.

mpm-server-limit.title: ServerLimit
mpm-server-limit.description: Value used to set ServerLimit on apache configuration.

mpm-max-clients.title: MaxClients
mpm-max-clients.description: Value used to set MaxClients on apache configuration.

mpm-start-servers.title: StartServers
mpm-start-servers.description: Value used to set StartServers on apache configuration.

mpm-thread-per-child.title: ThreadsPerChild
mpm-thread-per-child.description: Value used to set ThreadsPerChild on apache configuration.

mpm-graceful-shutdown-timeout.title: ThreadsPerChild
mpm-graceful-shutdown-timeout.description: Value used to set ThreadsPerChild on apache configuration.

re6st-verification-url.title: Test Verification URL
re6st-verification-url.description: Url to verify if the internet and/or re6stnet is working.

-frontend-authorized-slave-string.title: Authorized Slave String
-frontend-authorized-slave-string.description: List of SOFTINST-XXX of Slaves, separated by space which is allowed to use custom configuration.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Base Domain for create subdomains (ie.: example.com).

nginx-domain.title: Nginx Domain
nginx-domain.description: Base Domain for create subdomains (ie.: example2.com) for websocket, notebook and eventsource.
